original_text: You must certainly put them to death. Your hand must be the first in putting them to death, and then the hands of all the people.
korean_text: 너는 용서 없이 그를 죽이되 죽일 때에 네가 먼저 그에게 손을 대고 후에 뭇 백성이 손을 대라

sentences.original_text: You must certainly put them to death
Your hand must be the first
and then the hands of all the people
